Here is my attempt at the task, following the specified output format:

Referring Unresolved Customer Grievances

1. Review the customer grievance thoroughly to understand the issue and what steps have already been taken to resolve it 2. Determine which department would be best suited to further investigate and address the unresolved grievance, such as: - Technical Support for product issues or defects - Billing for incorrect charges or refund requests - Shipping for lost or damaged deliveries - Management for serious complaints about service or personnel 3. Compile all relevant information about the grievance, including: - Customer's contact information - Detailed description of the issue - Order numbers, product details, etc. - Timeline of interactions so far - Reason(s) it remains unresolved 4. Compose a summary of the above to send to the appropriate department 5. Notify the customer that their grievance has been escalated and provide them with the contact information of the department that will be assisting them further 6. Follow up with the assigned department and the customer to ensure the grievance gets properly resolved in a timely manner
